build-type.name: Generate UnitGuide (test)
build-type.description: Generates experimental unitguide on ZK version releases

parameters.param:
PATH=C:\Program Files\CollabNet\Subversion Client;C:\Program Files (x86)\PHP\v5.6;C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Resource Kits\Tools\;C:\Windows\system32;C:\Windows;C:\Windows\System32\Wbem;C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\;C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\Client SDK\ODBC\110\Tools\Binn\;C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SQL Server\120\Tools\Binn\;C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\120\Tools\Binn\;C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\120\DTS\Binn\;C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SQL Server\120\Tools\Binn\ManagementStudio\;C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SQL Server\120\DTS\Binn\;C:\Program Files\Microsoft\Web Platform Installer\;C:\Users\admin\.dnx\bin;C:\Program Files\Microsoft DNX\Dnvm\;C:\Program Files\nodejs\;C:\Program Files\Git\cmd;C:\Ruby22\bin;C:\Users\admin\AppData\Roaming\npm npm install grunt npm install echo GITHUB_COFFEE > config\github.coffee grunt fetch --prod grunt static --prod robocopy . c:\projekty\zero-k.info\zkmanual\www\test /e
if errorlevel 1 ( exit 0 )
